div.h1:
Hi! I'm Khanh Tran, a
Software Engineer. CSS Artist. UI Designer. Content Creator.
div.p: I'm an 18-year-old who builds beautiful and helpful websites and web software, shares my learning experience in public, and uplifts hundreds of folks 280 characters at a time.
Let's work together to create beautiful websites and illustrations that impress your customers and boost your brand presence!

li.p: I'll build your website with HTML, CSS and JavaScript, tailored for you and/or your company! After development, let's work together to deploy your brand new website on the interwebz.
More than half of your webpage visits come from mobile phones, so it's important that your websites look awesome on screens of all sizes, big or small.
I'll create an awesome infographic sketch using OneNote or an illustration using CSS on any topic you want. Use it to inspire others on your social media!
I'll post your beautiful software (up to twice per week) on my Twitter profile for everyone to see, and get some traffic to your landing page! Not enough visits? Money back guaranteed! 😛

a.p: A minimalistic timer and to-do list app that harnesses the power of the Pomodoro technique. Features calming white noises that helps the user focus, and a no-distraction mode that stops the user from using the computer while focusing.
Anki, but with optimized UI which supports syntax highlighting like an IDE. The app uses the SuperMemo2 algorithm to choose cards that the user needs to review.
Who's the best at DSA among #100Devs? This awesome leaderboard tracks their scores in CodeWars!
A floating remote-controlled TV that plays Twitch code streamers. Sit down, relax, and enjoy!
TechCrunch landing page, but everything got changed to... kittens. What?
Just a cool-looking webpage of a superb salon.

img.alt: Separation of Concerns for Web Development
